comments: - in detector parameters specify eighter G or Vm (G = ln(Vs/Vm))
- xcoords and times can be eighter range or list; range has eighter min, max and len or min, max and step parameters
- i0 and psi0 can be constant, list or function
- output -> what should be dumped; all -> dump everything in each step; ["array_name&[steps]"] -> dump only certain array in certain steps
